project.description: This job saves a Docker image as a tar.gz file and uploads it to an AWS S3 bucket.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: bdc_ui_docker_tag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Docker tag for the BDC UI image

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Echo the bdc_ui_docker_tag parameter value for debugging purposes. echo "bdc_ui_docker_tag: ${bdc_ui_docker_tag}"
# Use the bdc_ui_docker_tag parameter to set the Docker tag for the BDC UI image. # If the parameter is not set the build should fail. if [ -z "${bdc_ui_docker_tag}" ]; then echo "ERROR: bdc_ui_docker_tag parameter is not set" exit 1 fi
# Create a directory for storing the Docker image output. mkdir -p docker_image_output cd docker_image_output
docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-biodatacatalyst-ui:${bdc_ui_docker_tag} | gzip > pic-sure-ui.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-ui.tar.gz s3://$S3_BUCKET_NAME/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-ui.tar.gz
